Address_en: No.1 Chung Yee Street, Ho Man Tin, Kowloon.
Address_cn: 九龍何文田忠義街一號
Ancillary_facilities_en:
• men's and ladies' changing rooms and toilets
  • a fee-charging car park (including 1 designated disabled parking space)
  • Other facilities include a table-tennis room with 10 table tennis tables and 2 American pool tables, an activity room, a fitness room and a children's play room.
  • Barrier Free Facilities: Accessible Toilet, Accessible Lift, Tactile Guide Path, Visual Fire Alarm System, Braille Directory Map/Floor Plan
Ancillary_facilities_cn:
• 男、女更衣室及洗手間
  • 1個收費停車場 (設有1個殘疾人士專用車位)
  • 其他設施包括1個乒乓球室(包括10張乒乓球桌和2張美式桌球桌)、1個活動室、1個健身室和1個兒童遊戲室
  • 無障礙設施：暢通易達洗手間、暢通易達升降機、觸覺引路帶、視像火警警報、觸覺點字及觸覺平面圖
Opening_hours_en:
7 am to 11 pm daily
(Tennis Courts of Ho Man Tin Sports Centre has been temporarily closed until further notice）
Opening_hours_cn:
每日上午7時至晚上11時
（何文田體育館-網球場現已暫停開放，直至另行通知）

Address_en: 195 Junction Road, Kowloon City.
Ancillary_facilities_en:
• Toilets and changing rooms with lockers are provided in the Park.
  • Other facilities include a hard-surface 7-a-side soccer pitch, 2 basketball courts, 2 sets of children's play equipment, a set of elderly fitness equipment and a jogging track of length 265 m with 5 fitness stations and a pebble walking trail.
  • Barrier Free Facilities: Accessible Toilet, Tactile Guide Path, Braille Directory Map/Floor Plan
Ancillary_facilities_cn:
• 公園內設有洗手間(包括暢通易達洗手間)、更衣室和貯物櫃
  • 其他設施包括1個硬地7人足球場、2個籃球場、2組兒童遊樂設施、1組長者健體設施、1條265米長的緩跑徑、5個健身站和1條卵石路步行徑
  • 無障礙設施：暢通易達洗手間、觸覺引路帶、觸覺點字及觸覺平面圖

Name_en: Ma Tau Wai Service Reservoir Playground
Address_en: 2A, Sheung Wo Street, Kowloon.
Ancillary_facilities_en:
• Toilets and changing rooms are provided in the playground.
  • No booking office is provided.
  • Other facilities include children's playing facilities and elderly fitness equipment.
  • Barrier Free Facilities: Accessible Toilet, Tactile Guide Path, Braille Directory Map/Floor Plan
Ancillary_facilities_cn:
• 遊樂場設有洗手間及更衣室
  • 沒有售票處
  • 其他設施包括兒童遊玩設施及長者健體設施
  • 無障礙設施：暢通易達洗手間、觸覺引路帶、觸覺點字及觸覺平面圖
Opening_hours_en:
May to August: 7 am to 7 pm daily
September to April: 7 am to 6 pm daily
Opening_hours_cn:
五月至八月: 每日上午7時至下午7時
九月至四月: 每日上午7時至下午6時
Remarks_en: Booking of the tennis courts can be made in advance through the Leisure Link or in person at any booking office in the leisure venues and the District Leisure Services Offices. Bookings can also be made on the spot at this venue by paying the charges with an Octopus Card.
Remarks_b5: 租用人士可經由「康體通」預訂網球場設施，並可親臨康樂場地和分區康樂事務辦事處內的售票處辦理租場手續。租用人士亦可親臨本場地即場租用設施，並以八達通卡繳付場租。

Name_en: North Kwai Chung Tang Shiu Kin Sports Centre
Address_en: 292 Wo Yi Hop Road, Kwai Chung, New Territories
Ancillary_facilities_en:
• 1 Multi-purpose arena which can be converted into 1 Basketball Court or 1 Volleyball Court or 4 Badminton Courts and 1 Indoor Tennis Court or Basketball Court with 448 Seats and 4 Wheelchair Seats
  • 3 Squash Courts cum Table-tennis tables with an area of 63 M2 each
  • 1 Multi-purpose Activity Room with an area of 96 M2 (Ancillary facilities: Wall mirrors, dance bars, sound equipment and gymnastic mats.)
  • 1 Fitness Room with an area of 63 M2
  • 1 Public Address System
  • 1 First Aid Room
  • 1 Men's and 1 Ladies' Toilets cum Changing Rooms (G/F)
  • 1 Men's and 1 Ladies' Toilets (1/F)
  • Barrier Free Facilities: Accessible Toilet (G/F & 1/F), Accessible Lift (with Assistive Listening System), Tactile Guide Path, Visual Fire Alarm System, Braille Directory Map/Floor Plan
  • 128 Lockers
Ancillary_facilities_cn:
• 1個可提供1個籃球場/排球場或4個羽毛球場及1個室內網球場或籃球場的多用途主場，設有固定看台座位468個
  • 3個面積各為63平方米的壁球室，附設乒乓球檯
  • 1個面積96平方米的多用途活動室附設2張乒乓球檯
  • 1個面積63平方米的健身室
  • 1套廣播系統
  • 1間救護室
  • 男女洗手間兼更衣室各1間(地下)
  • 男女殘疾人士洗手間兼更衣室各1間(地下)
  • 男女洗手間各1間(1樓)
  • 78個儲物櫃
Opening_hours_en: 7 am to 11 pm daily (except maintenance day)
